(0,1)Camp Hale

This hex is controlled by the Arsand Khanate

Alama Grcinic the assassin
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:0.5HD
AC:14
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1

Alama Grcinic wants help taking down Jaralen Hoelyivi in order to stop them from harming Lendora.

Alama Grcinic wants help preventing Ilorem Codarar from harming the Gali. They do not believe the monsters should be slain for no reason.



Ceeta Tasimise the maid
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:2HD
AC:15
Hit Bonus:2
Attacks:1

Ceeta Tasimise wants help taking down Venall Tarona in order to stop them from harming Seyll.

Ceeta Tasimise wants help preventing Jaralen Hoelyivi from harming the Gali. They do not believe the monsters should be slain for no reason.



Ilorem Codarar the servant
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:0.5HD
AC:13
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1

Ilorem Codarar hates the Ginagram, and will reward you for killing them.

Ilorem Codarar hates the Gali, and will reward you for killing them.



Jaralen Hoelyivi the lord
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:0.5HD
AC:13
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1
Level 1 Spells
Shield

Jaralen Hoelyivi hates the Lendora, and will reward you for killing them.

Jaralen Hoelyivi hates the Gali, and will reward you for killing them.

Jaralen Hoelyivi wants help taking down Lerrola Oasax in order to stop them from harming Alama Grcinic.



Lerrola Oasax the prophet
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:1
AC:12
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1

Lerrola Oasax plans to kill Alama Grcinic in the hopes that Jaralen Hoelyivi will fall in love with them instead.



Venall Tarona the mystics
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:1HD
AC:13
Hit Bonus:2
Attacks:3

Venall Tarona hates the Ginagram, and will reward you for killing them.

Venall Tarona hates the Seyll, and will reward you for killing them.

Venall Tarona wants help taking down Ilorem Codarar in order to stop them from harming Gali.

(0,2)Ninella

This hex is controlled by the Arsand Khanate

Golden Senthendu Empire members in this hex will pay PCs to investigate and disrupt Ninella gold supplies in nearby Ninella

Arsand Khanate members in this hex will pay PCs to investigate and stop the raids on their gold supplies that are being orchestrated by Golden Senthendu Empire

Mandov Elonant the madman
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:1HD - 1
AC:14
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1

Mandov Elonant uses a pearl that glows when elementals are nearby

Mandov Elonant hates the Monel, and will reward you for killing them.

Mandov Elonant hates Arondri Dandre and wants to convince Kymitasa Danamusalm to help ruin the reputation of Arondri Dandre within the Arsand Khanate. They might ask the PCs for help getting Kymitasa Danamusalm on side.



Gundon Tenadana the hunter
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:1HD - 1
AC:14
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1
Level 1 Spells
Read Magic

Gundon Tenadana hates the Zyrossm, and will reward you for killing them.

Gundon Tenadana hates the Monel, and will reward you for killing them.

Gundon Tenadana hates the Aelath, and will reward you for killing them.

Gundon Tenadana wants help taking down Fiarena Pryiil in order to stop them from harming Cestr.



Fiarena Pryiil the stablemaster
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:1HD
AC:11
Hit Bonus:1
Attacks:2

Fiarena Pryiil hates the Cestr, and will reward you for killing them.

Fiarena Pryiil hates the Aelath, and will reward you for killing them.

Fiarena Pryiil wants help taking down Mandov Elonant in order to stop them from harming Monel.

Fiarena Pryiil wants help taking down Gundon Tenadana in order to stop them from harming Zyrossm.



Kymitasa Danamusalm the adventurer

HP:0.5HD
AC:14

Attacks:1

Kymitasa Danamusalm wants help taking down Gundon Tenadana in order to stop them from harming Monel.

AC:12
Hit Bonus:1
Attacks:2

Hollayal Wenammal wants help preventing Mandov Elonant from harming the Monel. They do not believe the monsters should be slain for no reason.



Arondri Dandre the farmer
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:1HD - 1
AC:13
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1

Arondri Dandre hates the Aelath, and will reward you for killing them.

If Arondri Dandre trusts the PCs, they will ask the PCs to investigate Kymitasa Danamusalm because they suspect they are plotting something.

Monster (Theme:cat)
Appearance:Wolf-Zebra
HP:1HD - 1
AC:14
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1
Number Appearing:1-1
Intelligence:None

People in this hex regard the Nerelic as a menace and will greatly reward any person who travels to Jonldeni Peak to retrieve the a topaz ring that glows when Squirrel's are nearby which is said to be the only way that Nerelic can truly be slain.

AC:12

Intelligence:None

People in this hex regard the Puririth as a menace and will greatly reward any person who travels to Seat of Oronan to retrieve the Taiayl's morningstar of angels which is said to be the only way that Puririth can truly be slain.

(0,9)Seat of Synarar

This hex is controlled by the Arsand Khanate

Honano Baeneth the herbalist
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:6HD
AC:15
Hit Bonus:9
Attacks:3

Honano Baeneth hates the Erammae, and will reward you for killing them.

Honano Baeneth would like the PCs to retrieve the broadsword of painters from where it is guarded by Jiame Baniri.

Honano Baeneth wants you to find the broadsword of painters fast before it is taken by Rowado Cenaso. If you can prevent Rowado Cenaso from retrieving the item they will reward you.

Honano Baeneth wants help preventing Utandaro Feshail from harming the Nontzan. They do not believe the monsters should be slain for no reason.



Jiame Baniri the brigand
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:3HD
AC:12
Hit Bonus:3
Attacks:2

Jiame Baniri guards broadsword of painters

Jiame Baniri plans to kill Honano Baeneth in the hopes that Qulstev Ralduse will fall in love with them instead.



Bomall Lanern the blacksmith
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:3HD
AC:12
Hit Bonus:3
Attacks:2

Bomall Lanern wants help taking down Jiame Baniri in order to stop them from harming Honano Baeneth.



Utandaro Feshail the slave
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:6HD
AC:15
Hit Bonus:6
Attacks:1

Utandaro Feshail hates the Nontzan, and will reward you for killing them.

Utandaro Feshail wants help preventing Honano Baeneth from harming the Erammae. They do not believe the monsters should be slain for no reason.



Qulstev Ralduse the carpenter
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:6HD
AC:15
Hit Bonus:6
Attacks:1
Level 1 Spells
Read Languages
Sleep
Level 2 Spells
Detect Invisible


Rowado Cenaso the priestess
Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:3HD - 3
AC:13
Hit Bonus:2
Attacks:1

Rowado Cenaso says that the Jiame Baniri are also guarding the broadsword of painters, and they will pay you for its return.

Rowado Cenaso would you like the PCs to steal broadsword of painters from their rival Jiame Baniri.

Rowado Cenaso wants help taking down Honano Baeneth in order to stop them from harming Erammae.

Rowado Cenaso wants help taking down Utandaro Feshail in order to stop them from harming Nontzan.

(0,10)Fort Chiney

This hex is controlled by the Golden Senthendu Empire

A Arsand Khanate caravan is looking for guards to help transport lumber back to Seat of Synarar

(0,11)Anastor Valley

This hex is controlled by the Golden Senthendu Empire

Lamastt Saren the fletcher
Faction:Golden Senthendu Empire
HP:8HD
AC:16
Hit Bonus:8
Attacks:1

Lamastt Saren hates the Palora, and will reward you for killing them.

Lamastt Saren would like the PCs to retrieve the halberd of cooks from where it is guarded by Shala.

Lamastt Saren wants you to find the halberd of cooks fast before it is taken by Munorel Fontorik. If you can prevent Munorel Fontorik from retrieving the item they will reward you.

Ruske Vapiaro hates the Shala, and will reward you for killing them.

Ruske Vapiaro hates the Malins, and will reward you for killing them.

Ruske Vapiaro hates the Ashaiay, and will reward you for killing them.

Ruske Vapiaro says that the Shala are also guarding the halberd of cooks, and they will pay you for its return.

Ruske Vapiaro would you like the PCs to steal halberd of cooks from their rival Shala.

Faction:Arsand Khanate
HP:0.5HD
AC:14
Hit Bonus:0
Attacks:1

Kiamami Tenenes hates the Pechalla, and will reward you for killing them.

Kiamami Tenenes hates the Verreri, and will reward you for killing them.

Kiamami Tenenes says that the Jerasal are also guarding the Uzaliven's battle axe of the mind, and they will pay you for its return.

Kiamami Tenenes would you like the PCs to steal Uzaliven's battle axe of the mind from their rival Jerasal.

Kiamami Tenenes wants you to find the Uzaliven's battle axe of the mind fast before it is taken by Thelia Utharona. If you can prevent Thelia Utharona from retrieving the item they will reward you.

(1,9)Ralsher

This hex is controlled by the Baboon Court

Golden Senthendu Empire members in this hex will pay PCs to investigate and disrupt Ralsher gold supplies in nearby Ralsher

Baboon Court members in this hex will pay PCs to investigate and stop the raids on their gold supplies that are being orchestrated by Golden Senthendu Empire

Dalnal Liaias the druid
Faction:Golden Senthendu Empire
HP:8HD
AC:14
Hit Bonus:8
Attacks:1

AC:14
Hit Bonus:2
Attacks:1

AC:11

Attacks:2

Faction:Golden Senthendu Empire
HP:4HD - 4
AC:13

This hex is controlled by the West Falano Khanate

AC:12

Rhalanother Faelare would you like the PCs to steal happiness-halberd from their rival Kerogril.

Rhalanother Faelare wants you to find the happiness-halberd fast before it is taken by Grrali Deberis. If you can prevent Grrali Deberis from retrieving the item they will reward you.
